mapper.select: SELECT MBSP_ID FROM mbsp_tbl WHERE MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbsp_tbl(mbsp_id, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_PASSWORD, MBSP_ZIPCODE, MBSP_ADDR, MBSP_DEADDR, MBSP_PHONE) VALUES (#{mbsp_id},#{mbsp_name},#{mbsp_email},#{mbsp_password},#{mbsp_zipcode},#{mbsp_addr},#{mbsp_deaddr},#{mbsp_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT mbsp_id, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_PASSWORD, MBSP_ZIPCODE, MBSP_ADDR, MBSP_DEADDR, MBSP_PHONE, MBSP_POINT, MBSP_LASTLOGIN, MBSP_DATESUB, MBSP_UPDATEDATE FROM mbsp_tbl WHERE MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
